summary:
Ok this is the beta stage of Dremora\'s Rest.  It is a small ruin by Riverwood that contains the following: Daedrics items, chests (which contains items.), bed, dremora npc (non-companion but friendly), and a dremora (companion).
    First Mod I\'ve ever made.
descriptionHtml:
Users upload your own images I\'m having issues uploading my own. Ok this is the beta stage of Dremora\'s Rest.  It is a small ruin by Riverwood that contains the following: Daedrics items, chests (which contains items.), bed, dremora npc (non-companion but friendly), and a dremora (companion).
 First mod ive ever made.

Compatable- Should be compatable with realistic lighting, but we are not sure. It is compatible with Daedric Armor retextures.

We give thanks to garryg and cab95 for the Daedric Armor improvement Clean.

If there are any graphic or incompatability issues tahn please message me, or leave a comment. Thank you for your time :)
author: chaotic1258
